prompts: Create a fighting-type Pokemon with an athletic build and unique kicking abilities.
I want a Pokemon that specializes in martial arts and has a sleek, muscular appearance.
Generate a humanoid Pokemon with incredible agility and striking martial arts skills.
Make a bipedal Pokemon that excels in close combat with powerful legs.
Imagine a strong, kick-focused Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a martial artist.
Design a Pokemon known for its swift movements and striking poses in battle.
Show me a fighting Pokemon with an intense training background and a competitive nature.

distinctive_features: Distinctive head shape with large eyes
